Address.value: 373 SYNGROU AVENUE,,175 64 PALAIO FALIRO, ATHENS, 175 64, Greece

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Performance Shipping Inc is a provider of shipping transportation services through its ownership of containerships. The company's vessels are employed primarily on time charters with liner companies carrying containerized cargo along various shipping routes. It owns and operates five Aframax tanker vessels.
